Membership Renewal Invoice

Dear ${object.name},

Your membership is due for renewal in 3 months. Please find attached your invoice for the next year.

Renewal Details:

  • Current membership ends: ${object.membership_end_date}
  • New membership period: ${object.membership_end_date} to ${object.membership_end_date | add_months(12)}
  • Amount due: CHF 1,750.00

Please complete the payment to avoid interruption of your membership benefits.

Best regards,
The Membership Team

Dear ${object.name},

This email confirms that your membership has been cancelled.
